Text.Name: Policy_TianDaoShenDan
Text.Desc: Observe the night sky or Feng Shui, producing one Enlightenment Pill every once in a while.

Text.Name: Policy_TreasureHunt
Text.Desc: Hunt for rare treasures in unexplored locations. Different treasure will require different method and level of Intelligence.

Text.Name: Policy_Acceleration
Text.Desc: Send agents or disciples to supervise manual labor. Will gain extra production once in a while. The productivity of fields is affected by the farming stats; that of mines and spirit stone mines by minerals; that of logging camps by the population.

Text.Name: Policy_Discipline
Text.Desc: A warning for people not to be indulgent and immoral. Different disciplines are needed in different situations. Its success rate is affected by battles.

Text.Name: Policy_Secret
Text.Desc: Attempt to turn people who believe in other sects to our side. It is either disrupting the other agency's action, or interrupting ordinary people's lives. It takes a high level of Intelligence or a special method to succeed.

Text.Name: Policy_Sermon
Text.Desc: Tell people about the appeal of our religion. Different problems will come up and need to be handled. The result is affected by charisma, appeal and stability.

Text.Name: Policy_Give
Text.Desc: Give things to people who need them. Different problems will come up and need to be handled. You can gain a small amount of followers, appeal or influence.

Text.Name: Policy_Missionary
Text.Desc: Give things to people who need them. Different problems will come up and need to be handled. You can gain a small amount of followers, appeal or influence.

Text.Name: Policy_Submiss
Text.Desc: Become the only agency here. There will be various events to test your ability. Try to progress the incorporation, which will be accomplished when it reaches 20. One step goes wrong, mortals will feel threatened by us and you will have to start all over again. If another policy is chosen during the process, the incorporation will also be interrupted.

Text.Name: Policy_God
Text.Desc: Let a Shendao disciple to perform a miracle here.
